alert.note: Alert for Gregg; Rusk (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 5:26PM CDT until June 13 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN RUSK AND SOUTHWESTERN GREGG COUNTIES... At 526 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Arp, or 9 miles northeast of Whitehouse, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Quarter size hail has been reported in South Tyler with this storm. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Henderson, Kilgore, Overton, New London, Joinerville, Turnertown, Chapman, Monroe, Stewart, Chalk Hill, Church Hill, Laird Hill and Oak Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
